text: The Zodiac Killer is a 1971 American thriller movie directed by Tom Hanson and stars Hal Reed, Bob Jones, Ray Lynch and Tom Pittman. ==Other websites== * * Category:1971 thriller movies Category:1970s serial killer movies Category:American drama thriller movies Category:American independent movies Category:1970s independent movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:American documentary movies Category:American horror thriller movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:American serial killer movies Category:1970s crime thriller movies Category:Slasher movies Category:1970s crime drama movies Category:American crime drama movies
title: The Zodiac Killer
